verses.verse: And the whole <WH3605> congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> assembled together <WH6950> at Shiloh, <WH7887> and set up <WH7931> <WH853> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> there. <WH8033> And the land <WH776> was subdued <WH3533> before <WH6440> them.
And there remained <WH3498> among the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> seven <WH7651> tribes, <WH7626> which <WH834> had not <WH3808> yet received <WH2505> <WH853> their inheritance. <WH5159>

And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> unto <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> How long <WH5704> <WH575> are ye <WH859> slack <WH7503> to go <WH935> to possess <WH3423> <WH853> the land, <WH776> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of your fathers <WH1> hath given <WH5414> you?

Give <WH3051> out from among you three <WH7969> men <WH376> for each tribe: <WH7626> and I will send <WH7971> them, and they shall rise, <WH6965> and go <WH1980> through the land, <WH776> and describe <WH3789> it according <WH6310> to the inheritance <WH5159> of them; and they shall come <WH935> again to <WH413> me.

And they shall divide <WH2505> it into seven <WH7651> parts: <WH2506> Judah <WH3063> shall abide <WH5975> in <WH5921> their coast <WH1366> on the south, <WH4480> <WH5045> and the house <WH1004> of Joseph <WH3130> shall abide <WH5975> in <WH5921> their coasts <WH1366> on the north. <WH4480> <WH6828>

Ye <WH859> shall therefore describe <WH3789> <WH853> the land <WH776> into seven <WH7651> parts, <WH2506> and bring <WH935> the description hither <WH2008> to <WH413> me, that I may cast <WH3384> lots <WH1486> for you here <WH6311> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> our God. <WH430>

But <WH3588> the Levites <WH3881> have no <WH369> part <WH2506> among <WH7130> you; for <WH3588> the priesthood <WH3550> of the LORD <WH3068> is their inheritance: <WH5159> and Gad, <WH1410> and Reuben, <WH7205> and half <WH2677> the tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh, <WH4519> have received <WH3947> their inheritance <WH5159> beyond <WH4480> <WH5676> Jordan <WH3383> on the east, <WH4217> which <WH834> Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of the LORD <WH3068> gave <WH5414> them.

And the men <WH376> arose, <WH6965> and went away: <WH1980> and Joshua <WH3091> charged <WH6680> <WH853> them that went <WH1980> to describe <WH3789> <WH853> the land, <WH776> saying, <WH559> Go <WH1980> and walk <WH1980> through the land, <WH776> and describe <WH3789> it, and come again <WH7725> to <WH413> me, that I may here <WH6311> cast <WH7993> lots <WH1486> for you before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> in Shiloh. <WH7887>

And the men <WH376> went <WH1980> and passed through <WH5674> the land, <WH776> and described <WH3789> it by cities <WH5892> into seven <WH7651> parts <WH2506> in <WH5921> a book, <WH5612> and came <WH935> again to <WH413> Joshua <WH3091> to <WH413> the host <WH4264> at Shiloh. <WH7887>

And Joshua <WH3091> cast <WH7993> lots <WH1486> for them in Shiloh <WH7887> before <WH6440> the LORD: <WH3068> and there <WH8033> Joshua <WH3091> divided <WH2505> <WH853> the land <WH776> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> according to their divisions. <WH4256>

And the lot <WH1486> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> came up <WH5927> according to their families: <WH4940> and the coast <WH1366> of their lot <WH1486> came forth <WH3318> between <WH996> the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> and the children <WH1121> of Joseph. <WH3130>

And their border <WH1366> on the north <WH6828> side <WH6285> was <WH1961> from <WH4480> Jordan; <WH3383> and the border <WH1366> went up <WH5927> to <WH413> the side <WH3802> of Jericho <WH3405> on the north side, <WH4480> <WH6828> and went up <WH5927> through the mountains <WH2022> westward; <WH3220> and the goings out <WH8444> thereof were <WH1961> at the wilderness <WH4057> of Beth-aven. <WH1007>

And the border <WH1366> went over <WH5674> from thence <WH4480> <WH8033> toward Luz, <WH3870> to <WH413> the side <WH3802> of Luz, <WH3870> which <WH1931> is Bethel, <WH1008> southward; <WH5045> and the border <WH1366> descended <WH3381> to Ataroth-adar, <WH5853> near <WH5921> the hill <WH2022> that <WH834> lieth on the south side <WH4480> <WH5045> of the nether <WH8481> Beth-horon. <WH1032>

And the border <WH1366> was drawn <WH8388> thence, and compassed <WH5437> the corner <WH6285> of the sea <WH3220> southward, <WH5045> from <WH4480> the hill <WH2022> that <WH834> lieth before <WH592> <WH6440> Beth-horon <WH1032> southward; <WH5045> and the goings out <WH8444> thereof were <WH1961> at <WH413> Kirjath-baal, <WH7154> which <WH1931> is Kirjath-jearim, <WH7157> a city <WH5892> of the children <WH1121> of Judah: <WH3063> this <WH2063> was the west <WH3220> quarter. <WH6285>

And the south <WH5045> quarter <WH6285> was from the end <WH4480> <WH7097> of Kirjath-jearim, <WH7157> and the border <WH1366> went out <WH3318> on the west, <WH3220> and went out <WH3318> to <WH413> the well <WH4599> of waters <WH4325> of Nephtoah. <WH5318>

And the border <WH1366> came down <WH3381> to <WH413> the end <WH7097> of the mountain <WH2022> that <WH834> lieth before <WH5921> <WH6440> the valley <WH1516> of the son <WH1121> of Hinnom, <WH2011> and which <WH834> is in the valley <WH6010> of the giants <WH7497> on the north, <WH6828> and descended <WH3381> to the valley <WH1516> of Hinnom, <WH2011> to <WH413> the side <WH3802> of Jebusi <WH2983> on the south, <WH5045> and descended <WH3381> to En-rogel, <WH5883>

And was drawn <WH8388> from the north, <WH4480> <WH6828> and went forth <WH3318> to En-shemesh, <WH5885> and went forth <WH3318> toward <WH413> Geliloth, <WH1553> which <WH834> is over against <WH5227> the going up <WH4608> of Adummim, <WH131> and descended <WH3381> to the stone <WH68> of Bohan <WH932> the son <WH1121> of Reuben, <WH7205>
And passed <WH5674> along toward <WH413> the side <WH3802> over against <WH4136> Arabah <WH6160> northward, <WH6828> and went down <WH3381> unto Arabah: <WH6160>

And the border <WH1366> passed along <WH5674> to <WH413> the side <WH3802> of Beth-hoglah <WH1031> northward: <WH6828> and the outgoings <WH8444> of the border <WH1366> were <WH1961> at <WH413> the north <WH6828> bay <WH3956> of the salt <WH4417> sea <WH3220> at <WH413> the south <WH5045> end <WH7097> of Jordan: <WH3383> this <WH2088> was the south <WH5045> coast. <WH1366>

And Jordan <WH3383> was the border <WH1379> of it on the east <WH6924> side. <WH6285> This <WH2063> was the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin, <WH1144> by the coasts <WH1367> thereof round about, <WH5439> according to their families. <WH4940>

Now the cities <WH5892> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> according to their families <WH4940> were <WH1961> Jericho, <WH3405> and Beth-hoglah, <WH1031> and the valley <WH6010> of Keziz, <WH7104>
And Beth-arabah, <WH1026> and Zemaraim, <WH6787> and Bethel, <WH1008>
And Avim, <WH5761> and Parah, <WH6511> and Ophrah, <WH6084>
And Chephar-haammonai, <WH3726> and Ophni, <WH6078> and Gaba; <WH1387> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their villages: <WH2691>
Gibeon, <WH1391> and Ramah, <WH7414> and Beeroth, <WH881>
And Mizpeh, <WH4708> and Chephirah, <WH3716> and Mozah, <WH4681>
And Rekem, <WH7552> and Irpeel, <WH3416> and Taralah, <WH8634>

And Zelah, <WH6762> Eleph, <WH507> and Jebusi, <WH2983> which <WH1931> is Jerusalem, <WH3389> Gibeath, <WH1394> and Kirjath; <WH7157> fourteen <WH702> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their villages. <WH2691> This <WH2063> is the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> according to their families. <WH4940>
